## About me
I am a PhD student in applied mathematics at KTH in Stockholm, Sweden. I completed both my bachelor's and master's degrees at La Sapienza University in Rome. My research focuses on Stochastic control theory with application to Pollution and Energy Markets. 


**Interests:** Control Theory, Stochastic Calculus, SDE, BSDE, ML and Neural Networks, Energy Markets,  Mathematical Finance, Pollution Control


## Inquiries
If you have any questions about my work or are interested in collaborating, please don't hesitate to [contact me](mailto:pucci@kth.se).
